CONJUGATES: noun: ice (singular) | ices (plural) || verb: ice (base) | ices (3rd person singular present) | icing (present participle) | iced (past tense, past participle)
ETYMOLOGY: From Old English īs, from Proto-Germanic *īsan, ultimately from Proto-Indo-European *h₁eyseh₂.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Water frozen solid, typically in the form of transparent crystals.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I need some ice for my drink to make it colder.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我的饮料需要一些冰块来使其变冷。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Diamonds or other expensive jewelry, especially when ostentatiously displayed.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (俚语) 钻石；珠宝首饰 (尤指佩戴以炫耀)
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He was showing off his new ice, a huge diamond chain around his neck.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他正在炫耀他的新首饰，脖子上戴着一条巨大的钻石项链。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A street name for crystal methamphetamine.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The police found a large quantity of ice during the raid on the drug dealer's apartment.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 警方在对毒贩公寓的突袭中发现了大量冰毒。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Verb: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To cover or cool with ice; to turn into ice; to apply a coating of icing to something.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 结冰；用冰冷却；给…加冰；给…加糖霜
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please ice the drinks before the party. | The roads have iced over completely. | She spent hours icing the wedding cake.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请在派对前把饮料冰镇一下。| 道路已经完全结冰了。| 她花了几个小时给婚礼蛋糕加糖霜。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Verb: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The hitman was hired to ice the witness before the trial.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 杀手受雇在审判前干掉证人。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Verb: a word used to describe an action, state, or occurrence.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To secure a victory or put an end to uncertainty in a game or contest. (In ice hockey, to shoot the puck from behind one's own blue line across the opponent's goal line without touching it, resulting in a penalty.)
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (体育，尤指美式体育) 确保胜利；锁定胜局；(冰球) 越区传球 (犯规)
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The quarterback's late touchdown iced the game for his team. | The referee called icing when the player shot the puck down the ice.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 四分卫的晚期达阵为他的球队锁定了胜局。| 当球员将冰球射过冰面时，裁判判了越区传球。
